Command.Name: validateApplicationConstants
Command.Description: Validates all application constants and all plugin constants for plugins loaded by the application.

Command.Name: validateApplicationCommandAliases
Command.Description: Validates all application command aliases and all plugin command aliases for plugins loaded by the application.

Command.Name: validateApplicationWorkflows
Command.Description: Validates all application workflows and all plugin workflows for plugins loaded by the application.

Command.Name: allApplicationValidations
Command.Description: Validates all application validations and all plugin validations for plugins loaded by the application.
